AGREEMENT FOR FINANCE, TALENT ACQUISITION (TA) OR PEOPLE MANAGEMENT (HR) SYSTEMS AND FILES\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All staff handling personally identifiable information must read, understand and agree to comply with\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM's Work Instruction: Protection Rules for Units Processing Sensitive Personal Data\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", including its associated standards and procedures.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Work Instruction can be found on EPAM's Process Asset Library\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pal.epam.com/pal_method_plugin/guidances/supportingmaterials/DataPrivacyPolicies_79DA6B20.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a user of Finance, Talent Acquisition or People Management systems, including, but not limited to, UPSA, Telescope, Payroll Systems, Compensation, VTS, Time, Feedback, Staffing Radar, Staffing Desk, SAP, Certent, UBS, CTC, Concur, CRS, FC Checklist, and HPAM, you must also read, understand and agree to comply with your obligations as set out in this confidentially agreement by signing the duplicate copy and returning it for our records. This agreement does not replace your information responsibilities as set out in EPAM'S overarching information governance policies but reinforces some of the core requirements.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any failure by you to comply with this agreement or EPAM's Work Instruction: Protection Rules for Units Processing Sensitive Personal Data may result in disciplinary action, including immediate dismissal for gross or serious misconduct. There may also be criminal penalties for breaches of privacy or confidentiality.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By signing this agreement, you agree:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" To ensure that any information you create, receive, hold or transmit through the Finance, Talent Acquisition or People Management systems is handled securely and confidentially at all times;\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" To only access and use personally identifiable or confidential information for the purposes of your role;\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" To not use any such information for personal gain or benefit;\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" To only discuss or divulge such information in the performance of your normal work duties and with EPAM staff or vendors if they require access to that information for legitimate business reason If you are unsure, please contact your line manager;\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" To keep your password strictly confidential and not allow anyone (whether in Finance/ Talent Acquisition/People Management or not) to use your username or password to access EPAM's IT, Finance, Talent Acquisition and People Management systems;\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" To inform\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:privacy@epacom\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"privacy@epacom\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"immediately if you suspect that EPAM's Finance, Talent Acquisition and People Management or IT Systems have been compromised or someone has had unauthorized access to personally identifiable or confidential information; and\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" To inform your line manager immediately if you no longer need access to the Finance, Talent Acquisition or People Management systems (for example due to a change in your role or responsibilities) or you consider you have been granted excessive rights to view or process personally identifiable or confidential information (for example, seeing data of employees outside of your role's geographic region).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Acknowledgment\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I have read this Confidentiality Agreement for Finance, People Management (HR), and Talent Acquisition (TA) Related Systems and Files and agree to comply with my obligations in this agreement and EPAM's Work Instruction: Protection Rules for Units Processing Sensitive Personal Data, including its associated standards and procedures. I understand that a failure to comply with these obligations may result in disciplinary action, including the immediate termination of my employment for gross or serious misconduct.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
